```{r, include = FALSE}
print_results <- function(ticker){
  # print(paste("Stock price", ticker))
  
  pred <- readd(paste0("modeling_data_", ticker), 
                character_only = TRUE) %>% 
    mutate(.ticker = ticker) %>% 
    select(.ticker, .model_desc, .index, .value, .conf_lo, .conf_hi) %>% 
    knitr::kable()
  
  return(pred)
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
tickers <-  list.files("data") %>% stringr::str_sub(7, 9) 
lapply(tickers, print_results)
```
